name: Atan2
briefdescription: Computes arctangent pixel-wise from two images.
detaileddescription:
This class is parametrized over the types of the two input images and the type of the output image. Numeric conversions (castings) are done by the C++ defaults.
Both pixel input types are casted todoublein order to be used as parameters ofvcl_atan2(). The resultingdoublevalue is casted to the output pixel type.
